mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view the list of advertisements
List Advertisements View displays the list of advertisements
Admin clicks on the edit button of an advertisement
Edit Advertisement View shows the content of the advertisement
Admin edits the advertisement data and clicks save
Edit Advertisement View sends the information to AdsController
AdsController saves the data in AdsModel
AdsModel returns the saved data to AdsController
AdsController returns the save result to Edit Advertisement View
Edit Advertisement View displays the edited advertisement
